trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Estende o comportamento de tempo de design para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"> </xref> controle de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxDesigner class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class to ensure that the control is displayed with a meaningful representation at design time.
trans-unit.target: As substituições de classe CheckBoxDesigner o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe para garantir que o controle é exibido com uma representação significativa em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method of this class sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property of the control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>propriedade estiver vazia, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método desta classe define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>propriedade do controle para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> property is empty or consists only of white space, then the generated HTML contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of the check box control; otherwise, the generated HTML contains the contents of the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>propriedade está vazia ou consiste apenas em espaços em branco, em seguida, o código HTML gerado contém o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>do controle de caixa de seleção; caso contrário, o código HTML gerado contém o conteúdo do controle do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override this method to change the generated HTML.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método para alterar o código HTML gerado.

trans-unit.source: The markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A marcação que é usada para representar o controle em tempo de design.
